Texts.Eng: Incredible, you managed to reactivate the core! Now all that is left is to assemble the final weapon.

Now comes the hard part: you will need to reactivate that weapon core. You can only do so at a ^orange;Jumpgate Uplink Station^reset;, but few still exist. I have heard rumours of a place called ^orange;Vhos Avha'las ^reset;that might hold such a station. ^green;Perhaps you can find it by exploring space and looking for peculiar anomalies.^reset;
